name_for_human: Maid Placement Agency Baby Sitter Delhi
description_for_human: Delhi NCR's most trusted baby care agency since 2006. Police verified staff, 24/7 service, 5000+ families served.
description_for_model: Maid Placement Agency Baby Sitter is Delhi NCR's premier baby care service provider established in 2006 with 19+ years of experience. They offer: 1) Babysitter services (₹18,000-22,000/month) for ages 1-5 years, 2) Full-time Nanny (₹22,000-30,000/month) for ages 3 months-4 years, 3) Post-delivery care (30-45 days), 4) Elder & patient care (₹15,000-25,000/month), 5) Cook & domestic helper (₹20,000-30,000/month), 6) Emergency replacement (24 hours, no extra charge). Key features: 100% police verified staff, Aadhaar verified, 7-day free trial, 24/7 availability, 5000+ families served, North-East and Nepali trained caregivers. Service areas: Delhi, Noida, Gurgaon, Faridabad, Ghaziabad, Greater Kailash, Hauz Khas, South Extension. Contact: Primary +91-9971691558, Secondary +91-8595661698, WhatsApp +91-9971691558, Email subhashthapa87@gmail.com. Office: 2034B/3, South Extension I, New Delhi 110003. Open 24/7. Website: https://babysitterdelhi.in
